title: Patagonia, Argentina
description: In December 2011 my family took a trip to Patagonia, the southernmost region of Argentina.

photos.description: Two Magellanic penguins wondering what we're doing.
A cool shoreline. I like how the trees go almost up to the water.
A path on a grassy hill leading off into the distance in a very motivational-poster-follow-your-own-path kind of way.
A hawk or something looking pretty cool.
Ushuaia, the southernmost city in Argentina. I think those mountains across the water are in Chile.
A very spiky glacier that we hiked around on.
Some glowing blue ice on the glacier. Something to do with the light entering and bouncing around inside the ice before coming back out.
A trio of authentic Patagonian dogs wrestling.
A very cold lake at the top of a mountain.
